code.husky

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.husky.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQL, SQLite

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Database class, serves as a base for any connection method (MySQL, SQLite, etc.)
    Author:
    -_Husky_-, tips48

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean checkConnection()
      Checks if a connection is open with the database
      abstract void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection with the database
      abstract java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Gets the connection with the database
      abstract java.sql.Connection openConnection()
      Opens a connection with the database

    • Method Detail

      • openConnection

        public abstract java.sql.Connection openConnection()
        Opens a connection with the database
        Returns:
        Connection opened

        public abstract boolean checkConnection()
        Checks if a connection is open with the database
        Returns:
        true if a connection is open

        Gets the connection with the database
